Title.titleHeading: Meet new and interesting dogs nearby.

Features.featureParagraphOne: So easy to use, even your dog could do it.
Features.featureParagraphTwo: We have all the dogs, the greatest dogs.
Features.featureParagraphThree: Find the love of your dog's life or your money back.

Testimonials.testimonialsContentOne: I no longer have to sniff other dogs for love. I've found the hottest Corgi on tindog. Woof.
Testimonials.testimonialsContentTwo: My dog used to be so lonely, but with tindog's help, they've found the love of their life. I think.
